mapper.sql: ORG_MONTH_STATISTICS_ID orgMonthStatisticsId, STATISTICS_RECORD_ID statisticsRecordId, ORG_ID orgId, ORG_NAME orgName, REGION_ID regionId, REGION_NAME regionName, ITEM_ID itemId, ITEM_NAME itemName, APPLYINST_SOURCE applyinstSource, MONTH_APPLY_COUNT monthApplyCount, ALL_APPLY_COUNT allApplyCount, APPLY_ON_YOY_BASIS applyOnYoyBasis, APPLY_LRR applyLrr, ALL_IN_SUPPLEMENT_COUNT allInSupplementCount, IN_SUPPLEMENT_ON_YOY_BASIS inSupplementOnYoyBasis, IN_SUPPLEMENT_LRR inSupplementLrr, ALL_SUPPLEMENTED_COUNT allSupplementedCount, SUPPLEMENTED_ON_YOY_BASIS supplementedOnYoyBasis, SUPPLEMENTED_LRR supplementedLrr, MONTH_ACCEPTANCE_COUNT monthAcceptanceCount, ALL_ACCEPTANCE_COUNT allAcceptanceCount, ACCEPTANCE_ON_YOY_BASIS acceptanceOnYoyBasis, ACCEPTANCE_LRR acceptanceLrr, MONTH_OUT_SCOPE_COUNT monthOutScopeCount, ALL_OUT_SCOPE_COUNT allOutScopeCount, OUT_SCOPE_ON_YOY_BASIS outScopeOnYoyBasis, OUT_SCOPE_LRR outScopeLrr, MONTH_COMPLETED_COUNT monthCompletedCount, ALL_COMPLETED_COUNT allCompletedCount, COMPLETED_ON_YOY_BASIS completedOnYoyBasis, COMPLETED_LRR completedLrr, MONTH_SPECIFIC_ROUTINE_COUNT monthSpecificRoutineCount, ALL_SPECIFIC_ROUTINE_COUNT allSpecificRoutineCount, SPECIFIC_ROUTINE_ON_YOY_BASIS specificRoutineOnYoyBasis, SPECIFIC_ROUTINE_LRR specificRoutineLrr, ALL_WARINING_COUNT allWariningCount, MONTH_OVER_TIME_COUNT monthOverTimeCount, ALL_OVER_TIME_COUNT allOverTimeCount, OVER_TIME_ON_YOY_BASIS overTimeOnYoyBasis, OVER_TIME_LRR overTimeLrr, ALL_ACCEPTANCE_RATE allAcceptanceRate, ALL_OUT_SCOPE_RATE allOutScopeRate, ALL_OVER_TIME_RATE allOverTimeRate, ALL_COMPLETED_RATE allCompletedRate, STATISTICS_START_DATE statisticsStartDate, STATISTICS_END_DATE statisticsEndDate, STATISTICS_MONTH statisticsMonth, MODIFIER modifier, MODIFY_TIME modifyTime, ROOT_ORG_ID rootOrgId
mapper.update:
update AEA_ANA_ORG_MONTH_STATISTICS
ORG_MONTH_STATISTICS_ID = #{orgMonthStatisticsId},
STATISTICS_RECORD_ID = #{statisticsRecordId},
ORG_ID = #{orgId},
ORG_NAME = #{orgName},
REGION_ID = #{regionId},
REGION_NAME = #{regionName},
ITEM_ID = #{itemId},
ITEM_NAME = #{itemName},
APPLYINST_SOURCE = #{applyinstSource},
MONTH_APPLY_COUNT = #{monthApplyCount},
ALL_APPLY_COUNT = #{allApplyCount},
APPLY_ON_YOY_BASIS = #{applyOnYoyBasis},
APPLY_LRR = #{applyLrr},
ALL_IN_SUPPLEMENT_COUNT = #{allInSupplementCount},
IN_SUPPLEMENT_ON_YOY_BASIS = #{inSupplementOnYoyBasis},
IN_SUPPLEMENT_LRR = #{inSupplementLrr},
ALL_SUPPLEMENTED_COUNT = #{allSupplementedCount},
SUPPLEMENTED_ON_YOY_BASIS = #{supplementedOnYoyBasis},
SUPPLEMENTED_LRR = #{supplementedLrr},
MONTH_ACCEPTANCE_COUNT = #{monthAcceptanceCount},
ALL_ACCEPTANCE_COUNT = #{allAcceptanceCount},
ACCEPTANCE_ON_YOY_BASIS = #{acceptanceOnYoyBasis},
ACCEPTANCE_LRR = #{acceptanceLrr},
MONTH_OUT_SCOPE_COUNT = #{monthOutScopeCount},
ALL_OUT_SCOPE_COUNT = #{allOutScopeCount},
OUT_SCOPE_ON_YOY_BASIS = #{outScopeOnYoyBasis},
OUT_SCOPE_LRR = #{outScopeLrr},
MONTH_COMPLETED_COUNT = #{monthCompletedCount},
ALL_COMPLETED_COUNT = #{allCompletedCount},
COMPLETED_ON_YOY_BASIS = #{completedOnYoyBasis},
COMPLETED_LRR = #{completedLrr},
MONTH_SPECIFIC_ROUTINE_COUNT = #{monthSpecificRoutineCount},
ALL_SPECIFIC_ROUTINE_COUNT = #{allSpecificRoutineCount},
SPECIFIC_ROUTINE_ON_YOY_BASIS = #{specificRoutineOnYoyBasis},
SPECIFIC_ROUTINE_LRR = #{specificRoutineLrr},
ALL_WARINING_COUNT = #{allWariningCount},
MONTH_OVER_TIME_COUNT = #{monthOverTimeCount},
ALL_OVER_TIME_COUNT = #{allOverTimeCount},
OVER_TIME_ON_YOY_BASIS = #{overTimeOnYoyBasis},
OVER_TIME_LRR = #{overTimeLrr},
ALL_ACCEPTANCE_RATE = #{allAcceptanceRate},
ALL_OUT_SCOPE_RATE = #{allOutScopeRate},
ALL_OVER_TIME_RATE = #{allOverTimeRate},
ALL_COMPLETED_RATE = #{allCompletedRate},
STATISTICS_START_DATE = #{statisticsStartDate},
STATISTICS_END_DATE = #{statisticsEndDate},
STATISTICS_MONTH = #{statisticsMonth},
MODIFIER = #{modifier},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime},
ROOT_ORG_ID = #{rootOrgId},
where ORG_MONTH_STATISTICS_ID = #{orgMonthStatisticsId}
mapper.select: select sum(aaoms.MONTH_COMPLETED_COUNT)MONTH_COMPLETED_COUNT, REGION_NAME from aea_ana_org_month_statistics aaoms where aaoms.STATISTICS_MONTH= #{yearMonth} group by REGION_NAME
